attributes.action: allow motorcycles to use bus lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
because it allows car drivers  more room,it eases congestion, it will mean less accidents between car drivers and motorcyclists which in turn keeps traffic flowing ,less ambulance call outs,encourage more people to use enviromenatly friendly transport 
(look at china where lots of people have to get around they use two wheeled transport to get around their local area)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
